title: Bitcoin , Ethereum , XRP , Dogecoin Gain As 2026 Looms : Analyst Expects  Nice Little Surprise  On New Year Day If BTC Does This - Grayscale Bitcoin Mini Trust ( BTC ) ( ARCA : BTC )
description: Leading cryptocurrencies rose on Tuesday, while the stock market slipped as the Federal Reserve released minutes from its December meeting.
